headline: Masco Corp.: DIY Headwinds And Cost Pressure From Tariffs Make Me Cautious
summary: Masco Corporation experienced a 16% drop in the DA segment, and tariffs are adding significant cost pressures in 1Q25. See why MAS stock is a hold.

headline: Simpson Earnings: What To Look For From SSD
summary: Building products manufacturer Simpson (NYSE:SSD) will be announcing earnings results tomorrow after market hours. Here’s what investors should know.
